title: [The Ivory Mask, Sitting Room]
description: Shafts of sunlight filter in through several glass-paned slits in the ceiling, combining with the luminary efforts of a lavish arrangement of candles to create an intensely bright area.  Several divans and couches sit against the walls, surrounding a gilt-edged mistwood table.  A large portrait hangs on the far wall in between two smaller pieces of artwork.

Dim shafts of moonlight filter in through several glass-paned slits in the ceiling, combining with the luminary efforts of a lavish arrangement of candles to create an brightly lit area.  Several divans and couches sit against the walls, surrounding a gilt-edged mistwood table.  A large portrait hangs on the far wall in between two smaller pieces of artwork.
